LEG_FRONT.visual_summary: Initial thermographic scan of LEG_FRONT shows a mean temperature of 24.46°C. Significant baseline heat concentration detected in the right side.

recovery_status.recommendation: High Risk: Implement immediate cryotherapy and 24hr complete rest. Possible localized strain.

LEG_BACK.visual_summary: Initial thermographic scan of LEG_BACK shows a mean temperature of 24.59°C. Heat distribution is relatively uniform across both limbs.

recovery_status.recommendation: High Risk: Implement immediate cryotherapy and 24hr complete rest. Possible localized strain.
